method.name: append_data_from_buffer
method.description: Takes a [PackedByteArray] defining a model and imports the data to the given [ModelState3D] object through the [param state] parameter. [b]Note:[/b] The [param base_path] tells [method append_data_from_buffer] where to find dependencies and can be empty.

method.name: append_data_from_file
method.description: Takes a path to a model file and imports the data at that file path to the given [ModelState3D] object through the [param state] parameter. [b]Note:[/b] The [param base_path] tells [method append_data_from_file] where to find dependencies and can be empty.

method.name: append_data_from_scene
method.description: Takes a Godot Engine scene node and exports it and its descendants to the given [ModelState3D] object through the [param state] parameter.

method.name: generate_buffer_from_data
method.description: Takes a [ModelState3D] object through the [param state] parameter and returns a model [PackedByteArray].

method.name: generate_scene_from_data
method.description: Takes a [ModelState3D] object through the [param state] parameter and returns a Godot Engine scene node.

method.name: write_to_filesystem_from_data
method.description: Takes a [ModelState3D] object through the [param state] parameter and writes a model file to the filesystem.
